name: viewmanager-js
description: Small view manager for Javascript to manage view of choosen DOM element. It splits view to top-left, top-right, center-left, center, center-right, bottom-left, bottom-right areas.

scripts.build: npm install && bower install && node build.js
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist

author: Mantas Bukauskas <ingenium3@gmail.com>
